snippet.title: C1 riders lose helmets case
snippet.description:
Beds/Bucks/Herts / 7 May 2004
Friday, 7 May, 2004, 11:53 GMT 12:53 UK C1 riders lose helmets case C1 riders told by the High Court they must wear helmets Riders of BMW C1 scooters…

snippet.description:

Court is to decide if BMW C1 riders need helmets The High Court is being asked to rule that people riding BMW C1 bikes are legally required to…

snippet.title: No helmet rider wins case
snippet.description:
England / 3 March 2003
185 of the 1988 Road Traffic Act, the BMW C1 is classed as a motorcycle, the court was told. Fourteen fellow C1 enthusiasts arrived at court…
